BOTH - Enum constant in enum class com.rubynaxela.kyanite.math.Direction.Axis
If the X and Y values are used to indicate that a vector is parallel with one of the axes of the cartesian coordinate system, BOTH means that the vector is not parallel to any axis (such a vector can be decomposed into two non-zero axis-aligned components).
